b:if.cond: data:content and (data:content contains "results" or data:content contains "label")

b:include.data: { showAuthor: false, showDate: true, isFeatured: true }
b:include.name: post-meta

b:if.p: Please Select Embedded Mode To Show The Comment System.*

b:include.cond: not data:view.search.label and not data:view.search.query and not data:view.isArchive
b:include.name: inlineAd

b:if.cond: (data:view.isPost or (data:view.isPage and (data:post.body contains "{showAds}"))) and data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "post-ads-1"
(data:view.isPost or (data:view.isPage and (data:post.body contains "{showAds}"))) and data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "post-ads-2"

b:tag.cond: (data:widgets.HTML any w => w.sectionId == "post-ads-4") or (data:widgets.Image any w => w.sectionId == "post-ads-4") or (data:widgets.AdSense any w => w.sectionId == "post-ads-4")
b:tag.name: div

div.p: This gadget is no longer available.

b:if.cond: data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "pbt-panel") and !data:isFeed

b:widget-settings.b:widget-setting: Subscribe to our mailing list to get the new updates.

b:if.cond: data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isMultipleItems or data:view.isPost or (data:view.isPage and (data:skin.vars.pageHeaderAds == "1px"))) and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "header-ads")

b:widget.title: The only blog that love WIZKID

b:if.cond: data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isHomepage and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "trending"))
data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isHomepage and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "home-ads"))

b:if.p: Please Select Embedded Mode To Show The Comment System.*

b:include.cond: not data:view.search.label and not data:view.search.query and not data:view.isArchive
b:include.name: inlineAd

b:if.cond: (data:view.isPost or (data:view.isPage and (data:post.body contains "{showAds}"))) and data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "post-ads-1"
(data:view.isPost or (data:view.isPage and (data:post.body contains "{showAds}"))) and data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "post-ads-2"

b:tag.cond: (data:widgets.HTML any w => w.sectionId == "post-ads-4") or (data:widgets.Image any w => w.sectionId == "post-ads-4") or (data:widgets.AdSense any w => w.sectionId == "post-ads-4")
b:tag.name: div

b:section.cond: data:view.isSingleItem and ((data:widgets.HTML any w => w.sectionId == "post-ads-1") or (data:widgets.Image any w => w.sectionId == "post-ads-1") or (data:widgets.AdSense any w => w.sectionId == "post-ads-1"))
b:section.name: Before Content

b:section.cond: data:view.isSingleItem and ((data:widgets.HTML any w => w.sectionId == "post-ads-2") or (data:widgets.Image any w => w.sectionId == "post-ads-2") or (data:widgets.AdSense any w => w.sectionId == "post-ads-2"))
b:section.name: After Content

b:section.cond: data:view.isSingleItem and ((data:widgets.HTML any w => w.sectionId == "post-ads-3") or (data:widgets.Image any w => w.sectionId == "post-ads-3") or (data:widgets.AdSense any w => w.sectionId == "post-ads-3"))
b:section.name: In-Article

b:section.cond: data:view.isPost and ((data:widgets.HTML any w => w.sectionId == "post-ads-4") or (data:widgets.Image any w => w.sectionId == "post-ads-4") or (data:widgets.AdSense any w => w.sectionId == "post-ads-4"))
b:section.name: Post Footer ADS

b:if.cond: (data:view.isMultipleItems or ((data:view.isPost and (data:skin.vars.postSidebar == "1px")) or (data:view.isPage and (data:skin.vars.pageSidebar == "1px")) and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "sidebar"))) and not(data:isFeed or data:view.isError)

b:widget-settings.b:widget-setting: Our website uses cookies to improve your experience. Learn more
GistDrop 2025 - Published with Blogger and Blogger Templates

b:includable.b:comment: If we are replacing the title, force it to render anyway, and it'll be hidden in CSS.

b:include.data: { buttonClass: "pill-button", limit: 1, items: data:this.data, itemSet: "data", itemsMarkup: "super.hierarchy" }
b:include.name: extendableItems

div.b:comment: No title for single profiles. Default to 'Blog authors' for team.

b:widget-settings.b:widget-setting: Smart gadgets, modern style, and tech trends that make daily life simpler, more connected, and easier to enjoy.

b:includable.b:comment: Clear out style (needs to be a non-empty string)
Clear out style (needs to be a non-empty string)

b:widget-settings.b:widget-setting: There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available.

b:includable.b:comment: Default the title to 'Popular posts from this blog'.
Ripple, and show 'keep reading' as the default.
Overridden, and migrated to postFooter. Called as postFooterJumpLink.
We don't display labels on the home page.
We call super.postShareButtons from the migrated positions.
Add a 'keep reading' link to the item-content.
Default the title to 'Popular posts from this blog'.
Ripple, and show 'keep reading' as the default.
Overridden, and migrated to postFooter. Called as postFooterJumpLink.
We don't display labels on the home page.
We call super.postShareButtons from the migrated positions.
Add a 'keep reading' link to the item-content.

b:if.cond: data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:view.isMultipleItems or data:view.isPost or (data:view.isPage and (data:skin.vars.pageFooterAds == "1px"))) and (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId == "footer-ads")
data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId in ["footer-info","footer-widgets"])

b:widget-settings.b:widget-setting: Smart gadgets, modern style, and tech trends that make daily life simpler, more connected, and easier to enjoy.

b:if.cond: data:view.isLayoutMode or (data:widgets any w => w.sectionId in ["footer-copyright","footer-menu"])

b:widget-settings.b:widget-setting: Our website uses cookies to improve your experience. Learn more

b:if.b:tag:
